con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Environment" value="Default"/> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="VoucherServiceSoap TestSuite"/> <con:entry key="Report to Generate" value=""/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="soapui-setings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="GetVoucherBatchTestCase"/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value="C:\Users\Nico\SOAP_UI"/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> </xml-fragment>

con:part.con:content:
<wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://vouchertool.com/vouchserv/definitions" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sch="http://vouchertool.com/vouchserv/schemas" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://vouchertool.com/vouchserv/definitions"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://vouchertool.com/vouchserv/schemas" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:vsv="http://vouchertool.com/vouchserv/schemas"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The VoucherTool (http://www.vouchertool.com) Voucher Service XSD. Copyright (c) by Nico Dirk de Wet 2012. All Rights Reserved.
Author: Nico Dirk de Wet (http://www.nicodewet.com)
The Voucher Service is a value-agnostic voucher management service specifically designed to be used in the Content Enricher Enterprise Integration Pattern. This generic, value-agnostic service serves as a highly re-usable component in a Service Oriented Architecture. GetVoucherRequest and GetVoucherResponse are essential operation when it comes to the Voucher Service being used in the Content Enricher Enterprise Integration Pattern as envisioned. GetVoucherResponse returns an element of type ContentEnricherVoucher (extends Voucher Type to include a batchNumber element). This element is essential when using the Content Enricher Enterprise Integration Pattern since the Voucher Service is value agnostic (by design). In the event of voucher redemption, having validated the voucher, the batchNumber can be used to enrich further, for example to determine the value (monetary or otherwise) of the VoucherBatch, in which case a separate data source (or service) may be used for this purpose.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <!--***************************************************--> <!--************** CORE TYPES ******************--> <!--***************************************************--> <xs:complexType name="VoucherBatch"> <xs:all maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xs:element name="voucherList"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1"> <xs:element name="voucher" type="vsv:Voucher"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="batchNumber" type="xs:positiveInteger"/> <xs:element name="expiryDate" nillable="true" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="active" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="creationDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Voucher"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="pin" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="serialNumber" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="expiryDate" nillable="true" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="active" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="redemptionDate" nillable="true" type="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ContentEnricherVoucher"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="vsv:Voucher"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="batchNumber" type="xs:positiveInteger"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--Result status code common to all API Response elements--> <xs:simpleType name="ResultStatusCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="0"/> <!--SUCCESS--> <xs:enumeration value="1"/> <!--FAIL--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SerialNumberType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:positiveInteger"> <xs:minInclusive value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ErrorCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="100"/> <!--VSV-ID INVALID--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--**********************************************************************--> <!--************** API: Request / Response Pairs ******************--> <!--**********************************************************************--> <!--** REGISTRATION **--> <xs:simpleType name="VoucherServiceIdType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="VSV-ID[0-9]{17}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:element name="RegisterRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:complexContent> <xs:restriction base="xs:anyType"/> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RegisterResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="vsvID" type="vsv:VoucherServiceIdType"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="resultStatusCode" type="vsv:ResultStatusCode"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--** VOUCHER BATCH GENERATION **--> <xs:simpleType name="VoucherBatchType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="REGULAR"/> <!--Initial state: VoucherBatch inactive, Vouchers active--> <xs:enumeration value="JUST_IN_TIME"/> <!--Initial state: VoucherBatch active, Vouchers inactive--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PinType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="NUMERIC"/> <!--Pin composed entirely of digits ranging from 0 to 9.--> <xs:enumeration value="ALPHANUMERIC_UPPER_CASE"/> <!--Pin composed of upper case alphabetic characters A to Z and digits 0 to 9.--> <xs:enumeration value="ALPHANUMERIC_MIXED_CASE"/> <!--Pin composed of upper case and lower case alphabetic characters a to z and A to Z, and digits 0 to 9.--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:element name="VoucherBatchGenerationRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <!--Required parameters--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="vsvID" type="vsv:VoucherServiceIdType"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="voucherNumber" type="xs:positiveInteger"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="batchType" type="vsv:VoucherBatchType"/> <!--Optional parameters - initialised to default values--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="pinLength"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:integer"> <xs:minInclusive value="6"/> <xs:maxInclusive value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="pinType" type="vsv:PinType"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="expiryDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="VoucherBatchGenerationResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="batchNumber" type="xs:positiveInteger"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="resultStatusCode" type="vsv:ResultStatusCode"/> <xs:element name="batchGenerationErrorList"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <!--Should be 4, to updated in future version--> <xs:element name="batchGenerationErrorCode" type="vsv:BatchGenerationErrorCode"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="BatchGenerationErrorCode"> <xs:union memberTypes="vsv:ErrorCode vsv:BatchGenerationSpecificErrorCode"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BatchGenerationSpecificErrorCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="200"/> <!--BATCH SIZE LIMIT EXCEEDED, MAX 1000--> <xs:enumeration value="201"/> <!--BATCH SIZE MUST BE GREATER THAN ZERO--> <xs:enumeration value="202"/> <!--BATCH EXPIRY DATE IN PAST--> <xs:enumeration value="203"/> <!--INVALID PIN LENGTH, MUST BE 6 TO 30--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--** VOUCHER BATCH FETCH **--> <xs:element name="GetVoucherBatchRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <!--Required parameters--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="vsvID" type="vsv:VoucherServiceIdType"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="batchNumber" type="xs:positiveInteger"/> <!--TODO include voucherList only option and make said field optional--> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="GetVoucherBatchResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="voucherBatch" type="vsv:VoucherBatch"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--** VOUCHER FETCH **--> <xs:element name="GetVoucherRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <!--Required parameters--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="vsvID" type="vsv:VoucherServiceIdType"/> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="pin" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="serialNumber" type="xs:long"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="VoucherErrorCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="305"/> <!--VOUCHER DOES NOT EXIST--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="VoucherReferenceErrorCode"> <xs:union memberTypes="vsv:ErrorCode vsv:VoucherErrorCode"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:element name="GetVoucherResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <!--Optional: voucher only present if errorCode not present--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="voucher" type="vsv:ContentEnricherVoucher"/> <!--Optional: errorCode only present if voucher not present--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="errorCode" type="vsv:VoucherReferenceErrorCode"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--VOUCHER BATCH ACTIVATION--> <xs:element name="ActivateVoucherBatchRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <!--Required parameters--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="vsvID" type="vsv:VoucherServiceIdType"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="batchNumber" type="xs:positiveInteger"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="BatchActivationSpecificErrorCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="400"/> <!--INVALID BATCH NUMBER--> <xs:enumeration value="401"/> <!--BATCH DOES NOT EXIST--> <xs:enumeration value="402"/> <!--BATCH ALREADY ACTIVE--> <xs:enumeration value="403"/> <!--BATCH ALREADY INACTIVE--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BatchActivationErrorCode"> <xs:union memberTypes="vsv:ErrorCode vsv:BatchActivationSpecificErrorCode"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:element name="ActivateVoucherBatchResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <!--Required parameters--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="batchNumber" type="xs:positiveInteger"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="resultStatusCode" type="vsv:ResultStatusCode"/> <!--Optional: Only present if resultStatusCode indicates FAILURE--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="errorCode" type="vsv:BatchActivationErrorCode"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--VOUCHER REDEMPTION--> <xs:element name="RedeemVoucherRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <!--Required parameters--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="vsvID" type="vsv:VoucherServiceIdType"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="pin"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="RedeemVoucherSpecificErrorCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="302"/> <!--VOUCHER NOT ACTIVE OVERRIDE USED--> <xs:enumeration value="303"/> <!--VOUCHER PIN LENGTH INCORRECT--> <xs:enumeration value="304"/> <!--VOUCHER EXPIRED--> <xs:enumeration value="306"/> <!--VOUCHER BATCH NOT ACTIVE--> <xs:enumeration value="307"/> <!--VOUCHER BATCH EXPIRED--> <xs:enumeration value="308"/> <!--VOUCHER HAS ALREADY BEEN REDEEMED--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="RedeemVoucherErrorCode"> <xs:union memberTypes="vsv:VoucherReferenceErrorCode vsv:RedeemVoucherSpecificErrorCode"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:element name="RedeemVoucherResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="resultStatusCode" type="vsv:ResultStatusCode"/> <!--Optional: Only present if resultStatusCode indicates FAILURE--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="redeemVoucherErrorCode" type="vsv:RedeemVoucherErrorCode"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--VOUCHER BATCH DEACTIVATION--> <xs:element name="DeactivateVoucherBatchRequest"> <!--TODO repetitive, identical to ActivateVoucherBatchRequest--> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <!--Required parameters--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="vsvID" type="vsv:VoucherServiceIdType"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="batchNumber" type="xs:positiveInteger"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DeactivateVoucherBatchResponse"> <!--TODO repetitive, identical to ActivateVoucherBatchResponse--> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <!--Required parameters--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="batchNumber" type="xs:positiveInteger"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="resultStatusCode" type="vsv:ResultStatusCode"/> <!--Optional: Only present if resultStatusCode indicates FAILURE--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="errorCode" type="vsv:BatchActivationErrorCode"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--VOUCHER BATCH SERIAL RANGE ACTIVATION--> <xs:element name="ActivateVoucherSerialRangeRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <!--Required parameters--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="vsvID" type="vsv:VoucherServiceIdType"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="startSerialNumber" type="vsv:SerialNumberType"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="endSerialNumber" type="vsv:SerialNumberType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="ActivateVoucherSerialRangeSpecificErrorCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="500"/> <!--START END SERIAL RANGE VALIDATION ERROR--> <xs:enumeration value="501"/> <!--SERIAL RANGE PORTION DOES NOT EXIST--> <xs:enumeration value="502"/> <!--SERIAL RANGE PORTION ALREADY ACTIVE--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ActivateVoucherSerialRangeErrorCode"> <xs:union memberTypes="vsv:ErrorCode vsv:ActivateVoucherSerialRangeSpecificErrorCode"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:element name="ActivateVoucherSerialRangeResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <!--Required parameters--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="resultStatusCode" type="vsv:ResultStatusCode"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="startSerialNumber" type="vsv:SerialNumberType"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="endSerialNumber" type="vsv:SerialNumberType"/> <!--Optional: Only present if resultStatusCode indicates FAILURE--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="errorCode" type="vsv:ActivateVoucherSerialRangeErrorCode"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="RedeemVoucherRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:RedeemVoucherRequest" name="RedeemVoucherRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="VoucherBatchGenerationRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:VoucherBatchGenerationRequest" name="VoucherBatchGenerationRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="RedeemVoucherResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:RedeemVoucherResponse" name="RedeemVoucherResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ActivateVoucherSerialRangeRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:ActivateVoucherSerialRangeRequest" name="ActivateVoucherSerialRangeRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="DeactivateVoucherBatchRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:DeactivateVoucherBatchRequest" name="DeactivateVoucherBatchRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ActivateVoucherSerialRangeResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:ActivateVoucherSerialRangeResponse" name="ActivateVoucherSerialRangeResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetVoucherRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:GetVoucherRequest" name="GetVoucherRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ActivateVoucherBatchRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:ActivateVoucherBatchRequest" name="ActivateVoucherBatchRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="RegisterResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:RegisterResponse" name="RegisterResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetVoucherBatchResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:GetVoucherBatchResponse" name="GetVoucherBatchResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="RegisterRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:RegisterRequest" name="RegisterRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="VoucherBatchGenerationResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:VoucherBatchGenerationResponse" name="VoucherBatchGenerationResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="DeactivateVoucherBatchResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:DeactivateVoucherBatchResponse" name="DeactivateVoucherBatchResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetVoucherBatchRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:GetVoucherBatchRequest" name="GetVoucherBatchRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ActivateVoucherBatchResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:ActivateVoucherBatchResponse" name="ActivateVoucherBatchResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetVoucherResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:GetVoucherResponse" name="GetVoucherResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="VoucherService"> <wsdl:operation name="RedeemVoucher"> <wsdl:input message="tns:RedeemVoucherRequest" name="RedeemVoucherRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:RedeemVoucherResponse" name="RedeemVoucherResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="VoucherBatchGeneration"> <wsdl:input message="tns:VoucherBatchGenerationRequest" name="VoucherBatchGenerationRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:VoucherBatchGenerationResponse" name="VoucherBatchGenerationResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ActivateVoucherSerialRange"> <wsdl:input message="tns:ActivateVoucherSerialRangeRequest" name="ActivateVoucherSerialRangeRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:ActivateVoucherSerialRangeResponse" name="ActivateVoucherSerialRangeResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="DeactivateVoucherBatch"> <wsdl:input message="tns:DeactivateVoucherBatchRequest" name="DeactivateVoucherBatchRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:DeactivateVoucherBatchResponse" name="DeactivateVoucherBatchResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetVoucher"> <wsdl:input message="tns:GetVoucherRequest" name="GetVoucherRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:GetVoucherResponse" name="GetVoucherResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ActivateVoucherBatch"> <wsdl:input message="tns:ActivateVoucherBatchRequest" name="ActivateVoucherBatchRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:ActivateVoucherBatchResponse" name="ActivateVoucherBatchResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="Register"> <wsdl:input message="tns:RegisterRequest" name="RegisterRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:RegisterResponse" name="RegisterResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetVoucherBatch"> <wsdl:input message="tns:GetVoucherBatchRequest" name="GetVoucherBatchRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:GetVoucherBatchResponse" name="GetVoucherBatchResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="VoucherServiceSoap11" type="tns:VoucherService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="RedeemVoucher"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="RedeemVoucherRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="RedeemVoucherResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="VoucherBatchGeneration"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="VoucherBatchGenerationRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="VoucherBatchGenerationResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ActivateVoucherSerialRange"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="ActivateVoucherSerialRangeRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="ActivateVoucherSerialRangeResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="DeactivateVoucherBatch"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="DeactivateVoucherBatchRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="DeactivateVoucherBatchResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetVoucher"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="GetVoucherRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="GetVoucherResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ActivateVoucherBatch"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="ActivateVoucherBatchRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="ActivateVoucherBatchResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="Register"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="RegisterRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="RegisterResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetVoucherBatch"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="GetVoucherBatchRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="GetVoucherBatchResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="VoucherServiceService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:VoucherServiceSoap11" name="VoucherServiceSoap11"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:sch="http://vouchertool.com/vouchserv/schemas"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <sch:GetVoucherRequest> <sch:vsvID>?</sch:vsvID> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <sch:pin>?</sch:pin> <sch:serialNumber>?</sch:serialNumber> </sch:GetVoucherRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:transfers.con:name: vsvID
vsvID
batchNumber

con:configuration.path: //*[local-name()='GetVoucherBatchResponse']/*[local-name()='voucherBatch']/*[local-name()='active']

con:transfers.con:name: Transfer pin

con:configuration.path: //*[local-name()='GetVoucherBatchResponse']/*[local-name()='voucherBatch']/*[local-name()='active']
//*[local-name()='GetVoucherBatchResponse']/*[local-name()='voucherBatch']/*[local-name()='voucherList']/*[local-name()='voucher'][1]/*[local-name()='active']

con:testCase.name: RegularVoucherBatchTest_Negative_Redemption
con:testCase.con:description: Register, generate a REGULAR VoucherBatch, attempt to redeem a Voucher (failure expected), activate the VoucherBatch, attempt to redeem the same Voucher (success expected), then attempt to redeem the same Voucher again (failure expected).

con:transfers.con:name: vsvID
Transfer pin
vsvID
vsvID
pin
